akn:section.akn:heading: Immunity from suit for disclosure of financial exploitation of senior citizens

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Relationship to State law Nothing in this section shall be construed to preempt or limit any provision of State law, except only to the extent that subsection (a) provides a greater level of protection against liability to an individual described in subsection (a)(2)(A) or to a covered financial institution described in subsection (a)(2)(B) than is provided under State law.
